A Christian meditacion or praier to be sayed at all tymes whensoeuer God shall vyset vs wyth anye mortall plague or sicnesse
4 leaves
By [S. Mierdman for] Wylliam Awen, Imprynted at London : 1551.
Printer's name from STC. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
